name: Space Exodus (itch)
description:
⚠️ Refresh the page if the game is muted

Earth's resources have run out 🥺

We need to find a new home

Protect humanity, keep it alive...

How to Play 🎮

• You win when you find a new habitable planet

• Find resources through sound

• Each resource makes a different sound 🔊

• Collect Water, Food, Energy and Heat

• If any resource runs out it is Game Over

• Use headphone (Game uses 3D audio) 🎧

• Controls: Arrows / WSAD

Team ⚒️

• Euler Moises: Game Design / Audio / Art

• Kaish: Unity Dev. / Code

Game developed for Ludum Dare 46 - April 2020
Theme: "Keep it Alive"  🕹️
